alert.note: Alert for St. Charles (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 03 at 11:17AM CDT until further notice by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Illinois...Missouri... Mississippi River at Grafton. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Illinois...Missouri... Mississippi River at LaGrange. Mississippi River at Lock & Dam 21. Mississippi River at Quincy. Mississippi River at Winfield. Mississippi River at Saverton. Mississippi River at Canton. Mississippi River at Hannibal. Mississippi River at Louisiana. Mississippi River at Clarksville. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 24 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Grafton. * WHEN...From this evening until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 21.0 feet, Water begins flooding the floor at the Palisades Marina in Portage Des Sioux. Access to homes along North Shore Drive in eastern St. Charles County becomes cut off near this height. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was 19.9 feet. - Bankfull stage is 18.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this evening and continue rising to a crest of 20.4 feet early Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7:00 am) Location Stg Stage Thu Fri Sat Sun Mon Mississippi River Grafton 20.0 19.9 20.1 20.3 20.3 20.4 20.4 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
